page.title: 11Transport 1
page.content: Mr. John MacKinnon(Balemartine) of Tiree Airport has agreed to be interveiwed. How many people work here? Only three at the moment.There should be four and we're just waiting on someone to be recruited. Is Tiree a busy airport? No. It's a quiet airport.It's used by Loganair and some charters. What kind of aeroplanes use the airport? Loganair use twin-otter engines.They are 18 and 19 seaters and travel from Glasgow to Tiree and Barra most days. Has there ever been an accident? No-thank goodness but we're always here in readiness. Tiree was used during World War 2. Where did the soldiers come from? It was used during the war as coastal command and as a meteorogical station.
